, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Reset RAM bar style to default?
Pressing the home button will wake your device
Pressing a volume button will wake your device
When the screen is off, long pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Visit the scott.hart.bti website for latest news about the ROM.
Find latest news and updates about BeanStalk.
BeanStalk source can be found at www.github.com/scotthartbti
Subscribe to BeanStalk Facebook page for updates.
Specify the region code for Wi-Fi
There was a problem setting the region code.
Enable Wi-Fi to change this option.
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Tablets and older phones use 160. Most phones use 240.
This step clears data from market, google play services and google services framework.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
Press back when done to return here.
"Couldn't open the market! If you're sure it's installed, open it yourself from the launcher."
Some values may cause compatibility issues with apps and the playstore, use at your own RISK!
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Be Advised that it is recommended to use a Multi-DPI Play Store to avoid any issues with apps after changing your system density. Do you understand?
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Hide low priority notifications such as those from Google Now.
Show active display notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Invert the colors when in areas with bright light such as direct sunlight.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display.

Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
Turn off display if the device gets pocketed again and was turned on by Active Display.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
Note: This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is out. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Shake will be disabled while in these apps

Activity to launch when shaken vertically

Changing this option resets your current lockscreen targets setup to default.
\n\nWith eight lockscreen targets enabled you cannot use your lockscreen shortcuts at the same time.

If halo has been enabled, multi window will be disabled completely
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies for task switching and moving gestures
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Halo will disappear completely when empty

Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
"Changing permissions of core Android components might lead to undesired behavior. Change settings here at your own risk!
Lock color will be set to the lock handle
Color of the widget and unlock frames
Allow legacy widgets that don\'t natively support lock screen placement

Some widgets may not behave as expected when placed on the lock screen. Other widgets may expose your personal data to anyone who accesses your device. Please be mindful of these warnings before continuing.
Show secure camera widget on the lock screen
Show widget maximized when screen turned on
Disables the glow on the edges that surrounds the widget pager on lock screen in portrait mode
Use carousel animation in portrait when switching between lock screen widgets

The BeanStalk Init.d scripts have been added to this build for experimental purposes only. While some people may see improved performance on certain phones, there is always the possibility that some phones may not benefit from the scripts and you may actually see a negative impact. The ideal situation is to find the right combination of scripts that provides the best bang for your buck while keeping a certain level of stability.
Configure the hours the device should be quiet
When to start enforcing quiet hours
When to stop enforcing quiet hours
Notification light will function as normal
Haptic feedback will function as normal
Quiet hours will enable when ringer is set to silent
Quiet hours will enable when ringer is set to vibrate or silent
This message will be sent to anyone who contacts you while quiet hours are active
[Automated Message] I\'ll get back to you when I can.
If an incoming message contains this text your phone will sound an alarm
" met the requirements to bypass Quiet Hours!"
Times cannot overlap: setting to closest possible time
WiFi can be in any state
Require device to be plugged in
Device charging can be in any state
Quiet hours relies on time functions
Individual times per day are enabled
A single set of times is enabled
Follow ringer mode (always on and timed)
Change the order of PIN pad numbers
Shake the lockscreen to enable security
Security will be disabled after each successful unlock
Your device will be insecure until you explicitly shake to enable a temporary secure lock. Once secure: if your device is successfully unlocked it will become insecure until you shake again.
Show slider lockscreen before secure unlock mechanism

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
The time between wifi scans when no stored access points are available
Windows Manager\'s max events per second
This is a runtime value that controls the number of events the system will allow in a second
The amount of time from when the system registers an incoming phone call until the ringer
This controls the size of the cache the Dalvik VM has access to
We should look because knowing is half the battle
*WARNING* if you change this value it will add the needed values to your build.prop if they are not already present
When you are in-call screen is off when the device moves away from your face this delay value controls how long before screen turns on
This is astetic and doesn\'t improve the system
Modify the buffer-size for better performance
Enable hardware acceleration where the GPU controls the UI instead of the CPU
View, select or change the displayed tiles
Reset displayed tiles and layout to default?
All tiles were removed. Quick settings are disabled.\n\nTo enable add a tile.

To add a quick settings tile, press the Add button and choose the tile you would like. To rearrange your tiles, longpress the tile and drag it into the position you want. If you want to delete a tile, drag it to the delete button which appears while dragging the tile.

To setup dynamic tiles press the respective icon on the top right of the screen

To disable quick settings, remove all tiles.

Each action will add a new state to the tile. Each click changes to the next state. Long-press to add long-press actions. If no click action exists the long-action icon will be used for the tile. This allows you to change states by clicking and launch actions by long-pressing.
Double-tap to switch to the previous action
An action must be set first

Advanced tile detected. Your tile will now change states when adjusted from anywhere. You may optionally input an icon and label for the toggle to switch to if it doesn\'t recognize the state it\'s in.
View or change quick settings style options
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
The chamber of secrets has opened
Change the password used for device encryption
Show clear all button within the recent applications view
Choose position of the clear all button
Show a memory indicator within the recent applications view
Choose position of the memory indicator
Show rambar memory in GB instead of MB
Enable holding the power button with the screen off to control Torch
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
See through lockscreen with blur effect
Set the blur radius for the blur effect
Allows visibility of the application or home screen behind the lock screen.
This will allow you to show you 4G instead of LTE
Stop touches in zones from reaching the application
The selected gesture area is too large and will not be set.
Select this option if you use LTE (4G).
When Wi-Fi is connected network mode is switched to 2G.
The device will switch to 2G when the screen is off.
When device is unlocked network mode switches to 3G again.
Pressing the menu button unlocks the device
Pressing the home button unlocks the device

Close the notification panel upon toggle
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Show power menu when screen is locked
Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide low priority notifications such as Google Now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Add possibility to toggle between normal and expanded viewby longpress. The expanded view sometimes shows more private information so you might want to disable it.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from being shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Sets the width of notifications dynamic, so that they only use the space they really need
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Choose between manners to show pending notifications on lockscreen

Each one of notifications on lockscreen services under (PEEK and LOCKSCREEN NOTIFICATIONS) will auto disable the other. the sensors status below should be green, PEEK or LOCKSCREEN NOTIFICATIONS uses two sensors in particular, the gyroscope or the proximity sensor.
Show latest notification after picking up your device
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Sets the background of the notification panel header to an image based on the current date and time
Install new sound packs added in SoundPacks folder on the internal storage

This will automatically manage your device battery usage and switch your network to user-defined power saving mode or normal mode depending on mobile data and Wi-Fi connection states
This will automatically manage your device battery usage to user-defined
Activate power saving mode when screen turns off
When screen turns on, power saving mode won\'t be deactivated until keyguard is unlocked
Delays changing of power saving mode

Activate power saving mode or changing screen brightness by specified battery level

we never can guarantee this will work on device

Disable sync connection when power saving activated
